channel.title: Fucking exception
channel.description:
It's really pissing me off. It randomely happens for the days then somehow gets fixed. Then it happens again, and I have no clue why. THIS HAPPENS ON EVERY SINGLE CLIENT I TRY. [code]Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:4953) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:140) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:182) at RSApplet.windowClosing(RSApplet.java:391) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Window.java:1862) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Window.java:1820) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4630) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2099) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2475) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4460) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:599) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThre ad.java:269) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread. java:184) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThre ad.java:174) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:169)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:161)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:122)[/code] Any ideas?

item.title: Fucking exception
item.dc:creator: @Mathew2 Mathew*
item.description:
@Mathew2 wrote:

reinstall the java on your computer.

item.title: Fucking exception
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

i would have to guess that it might be your java installation because you say it happens to every client and because of all the “java.awt” errors… “java.awt” is a class that comes installed with jdk.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking exception
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

It’s really pissing me off. It randomely happens for the days then somehow gets fixed. Then it happens again, and I have no clue why. THIS HAPPENS ON EVERY SINGLE CLIENT I TRY.

[code]Exception in thread “AWT-EventQueue-0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:4953)
at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:140)
at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:182)
at RSApplet.windowClosing(RSApplet.java:391)
at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Window.java:1862)
at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Window.java:1820)
at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4630)
at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2099)
at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2475)
at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4460)
at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:599)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThre
ad.java:269)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.
java:184)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThre
ad.java:174)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:169)

    at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:161)

    at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:122)[/code]

Any ideas?
